abstract: Lockheed Martin experienced computer network disruptions that could be tied to a hacking attack earlier this year on a supplier of security tokens.
snippet: Lockheed Martin experienced computer network disruptions that could be tied to a hacking attack earlier this year on a supplier of security tokens.
lead_paragraph: Lockheed Martin, the nation’s largest military contractor, has battled disruptions in its computer networks this week that might be tied to a hacking attack on a vendor that supplies coded security tokens to millions of users, security officials said on Friday.

headline.main: Data Breach at Security Firm Linked to Attack on Lockheed
headline.print_headline: Data Breach at Security Firm Linked to Attack on Lockheed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: RSA, The Security Division of EMC Corporation

byline.original: By Christopher Drew and John Markoff
